description: A CSS file for managing themes and styling elements of a todo application, defining variables for light and dark themes, and styling for the app's components such as headers, buttons, and responsiveness.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application container, setting text alignment, background color, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including height and pointer event control.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, including background color, layout properties, and font sizing.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for application links, controlling color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, and hover/active effects.
